mapper.insert: INSERT into product (price, name, unique_code, product_info, writer_no, trans_no, reg_date) VALUES(#{product.price}, #{product.name}, #{product.productInfo,typeHandler= com.practice.qtrproject.handler.TypeHandler}, #{product.writerNo, typeHandler= com.practice.qtrproject.handler.TypeHandler}, #{product.transNo, typeHandler= com.practice.qtrproject.handler.TypeHandler}, now())
